bibl.title: The Papyrus Manuscripts of the New Testament.
The Text of the New Testament in Contemporary Research: Essays on the Status Quaestionis
bibl.author: EPP, Eldon Jay

bibl.note: I. Introduction. - II. Discovery and Description of the Major New Testament Papyri. - III. Provenance of the New Testament Papyri. - IV. Transmission of Papyrus Documents in Early Christian Times. - V. Utilization of the Papyri in New Testament Textual Criticism. - VI. Significance of the Papyri for the New Testament Text: Past and Future.
EPP Eldon Jay, The Papyrus Manuscripts of the New Testament.
B.D. EHRMAN and M.W. HOLMES (Edd.), The Text of the New Testament in Contemporary Research: Essays on the Status Quaestionis = Studies and Documents. 46 (Grand Rapids, 1995) pp. 3-21.
